content: chore: adaptations for nightly-2025-06-26 nightly#2 Please review this PR. At the end of the month this diff will land in 'master'.
Now the PR is on the leanprover-community/mathlib4-nightly-testing fork (correctly) so we need to update the script to post a link there.
The PR itself is apparently broken, but at least the branches are in the right places!
I have added a nightly#2 linkifier, which the bot will use in future.
Sigh, the PR is broken, because the new CI system needs to check out the master branch to build scripts safely from. However, on the mathlib4-nightly-testing fork, we don't even have a master branch.
